markdownContent: «You must be {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}, I'm Timea Ricci, the curator for this museum. My specialty is SPECIALTY. I'm currently working on an exhibition about TOPIC and am still collecting some objects. Maybe you can help me finding some of them. I have this data-set here, which I found in our database. I'd like to use it in the exhibition, but I'm not sure how it looks like as the data-set doesn't have a picture. This makes it all the more difficult, maybe you can figure out, which object relates to this data-set.»
